inclusion.criterion: Patient at the Women and Infants Program in Women's Oncology
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Biopsy-proven complex atypical hyperplasia or grade 1 or grade 2 endometrial adenocarcinoma with endometrioid histology
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Disease clinically confined to the uterus (no physical exam findings or imaging to suggest extrauterine disease)
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Plan for hysterectomy at Women and Infants Hospital of Rhode Island
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Able to read English or Spanish
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Able to give informed consent for involvement in the study
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Known sensitivity to any component of depot medroxyprogesterone acetate
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: History of breast cancer, hepatic disease, uncontrolled hypertension, osteoporosis or strong osteoporotic risk factors including anorexia nervosa, rheumatoid arthritis and chronic glucocorticoid use
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Treatment with any progesterone or progesterone analogue in past 12 months
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has a history of CAD, hypertension, and chronic kidney disease. She also has an abdominal mass and was treated with IV antibiotics for a likely diverticular abscess.
